body_html: We currently use single fused weight and bias variables in order to speed up computation. Having separate initializers would lead to a significant slowdown. You are welcome to write your own RNNCell which creates separate weight variables, each with their own initializers.
body_text: We currently use single fused weight and bias variables in order to speed up computation.  Having separate initializers would lead to a significant slowdown.  You are welcome to write your own RNNCell which creates separate weight variables, each with their own initializers.
body: We currently use single fused weight and bias variables in order to speed up computation.  Having separate initializers would lead to a significant slowdown.  You are welcome to write your own RNNCell which creates separate weight variables, each with their own initializers.
